languages.text: "Давай договоримся. Я буду поставлять тебе добычу, выбирая ее сам{mf||а}. Ты будешь свободен в перемещениях по кораблю — пока не будешь трогать тех, кого запрещено".

traits.locale_text: "Давай договоримся. Я буду поставлять тебе добычу, выбирая ее сам{mf||а}. Ты будешь свободен в перемещениях по кораблю — пока не будешь трогать тех, кого запрещено".

languages.text: "Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."
languages.original_text: "Давай договоримся. Я буду поставлять тебе добычу, выбирая ее сам{mf||а}. Ты будешь свободен в перемещениях по кораблю — пока не будешь трогать тех, кого запрещено".

traits.locale_text: "Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."
"Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."
"Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."
"Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."
"Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."

languages.text: « Je vous propose un marché. Je vous fournirai des proies que j'aurai moi-même choisies. Vous serez libre de circuler dans le vaisseau, tant que vous vous abstiendrez d'attaquer qui que ce soit d'autre. »
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous propose un marché. Je vous fournirai des proies que j'aurai moi-même choisies. Vous serez libre de circuler dans le vaisseau, tant que vous vous abstiendrez d'attaquer qui que ce soit d'autre. »

languages.text: 「取引しよう。{mf|俺|私}が獲物を選んで提供する。船内を自由に歩き回ってもらって構わない。だが、本来手出しをしてはならない者たちに手を出したら終わりだ」
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."

traits.locale_text: 「取引しよう。{mf|俺|私}が獲物を選んで提供する。船内を自由に歩き回ってもらって構わない。だが、本来手出しをしてはならない者たちに手を出したら終わりだ」

languages.text: “咱们做笔交易吧。我把我选中的猎物交给你，你也可以在船上自由活动。不过，要是你碰了那些不该碰的人，这笔交易立刻结束。”
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."

traits.locale_text: “咱们做笔交易吧。我把我选中的猎物交给你，你也可以在船上自由活动。不过，要是你碰了那些不该碰的人，这笔交易立刻结束。”

languages.text: "Gehen wir einen Handel ein. Ich versorge Euch mit meiner Beute meiner Wahl. Ihr dürft frei durch das Schiff streifen, bis Ihr anfangt, jene zu attackieren, die ihr nicht anrühren sollt."
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."

traits.locale_text: "Gehen wir einen Handel ein. Ich versorge Euch mit meiner Beute meiner Wahl. Ihr dürft frei durch das Schiff streifen, bis Ihr anfangt, jene zu attackieren, die ihr nicht anrühren sollt."

languages.text: «Hagamos un trato. Yo te proporcionaré víctimas que elegiré personalmente. Tú serás libre para deambular por toda la nave, procurando no poner un dedo sobre quienes no debes».
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."

traits.locale_text: «Hagamos un trato. Yo te proporcionaré víctimas que elegiré personalmente. Tú serás libre para deambular por toda la nave, procurando no poner un dedo sobre quienes no debes».

languages.text: "Anlaşma yapalım. Sana kendi seçtiğim kurbanları göndereceğim. Dokunmaman gereken kişilerin peşine düşmediğin sürece gemimde özgürce dolaşma hakkına sahip olacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. I will supply you with prey of my own choosing. You will be free to roam about the ship until you start going after those you are not supposed to touch."

traits.locale_text: "Bir anlaşma yapalım. Sana kendi seçtiğim avları göndereceğim. Dokunmaman gereken kişilerin peşine düşmediğin sürece gemimde özgürce dolaşma hakkına sahip olacaksın."
